text: Harold William Holman (16 November 1957 â€“ 6 November 2020) was an English professional footballer. He played as a forward for Exeter City and Peterborough United in the Football League. His career lasted from 1976 to 1979. He was born in Exeter, England. Holman died on 6 November 2020, just ten days before his 63rd birthday. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Sportspeople from Devon Category:People from Exeter
title: Harry Holman (footballer)
